channel.copyright:
Welcome to study, discuss, even debate together.
No plagiarism please, because simply copying, even only one word, even only one minute, will waste time in our life. While copying, you use other’s opinions, but yourself don’t have one.

item.title: What is number theory
item.description: Number theory is the study of the set of psotive whole numbers 1,2,3,4,5,6…
